about_the_game:
This is a retro style nostalgic game! It's not just a throwback to the past: it mixes the best of the past with the best of the present! Differently than old games, Supershot has new elements like shooting with the mouse cursor. It's an action-adventure game, in which you will be jumping platforms, dodging ghosts, finding hidden items, shooting ghosts and solving riddles! It has magic, shots, hearts, lives, flight and more! Easy to learn, it is great for kids! It's fun as retro games and complete as today's games! It's simple and fun, you won't have a headache playing it! 24 stages!

Math Perfect and Good Play

Fun and Ironic Parody of Games

Contains the full Supershot game

name: Supershot Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11 x64
  • Processor: Processor (AMD): Athlon X2 2.8 GHz Processor (Intel): Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card (AMD): AMD Radeon HD 3870 Graphics card (NVIDIA): Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11 x64
  • Processor: Processor (AMD): Six-core CPU Processor (Intel): Quad-core CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti (4GB), GTX 1060 (3GB), GTX 1650
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: A retro game simple, complete and funny. Well projected and easy! Perfect for kids!
